sideshowbarker and finally actually moved boilerplates to a separate repo and made them `bikeshed update`-able. Any further fixes you need, just PR https://github.com/tabatkins/bikeshed-boilerplate, no need to roll a new pip version

In reply to @tabatkins:matrix.org
@sideshowbarker I finally actually moved boilerplates to a separate repo and made them `bikeshed update`-able. Any further fixes you need, just PR https://github.com/tabatkins/bikeshed-boilerplate, no need to roll a new pip version
Most excellent
